headline: Does the Recent 15% Drop Make Texas Instruments a Bargain in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Texas Instruments is a bargain, or if that price tag is justified? If you have even a passing interest in picking stocks for value, this is a name you can't ignore. Shares have slid by 15.2% over the past month and are now down 20.1% over the last year. This has certainly grabbed the attention of both growth seekers and value hunters. After a long run as a steady performer in the semiconductor space, Texas Instruments recently drew headlines for announcing new investments in...
